programme.title: Betty
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 Les filles sont dans la place

programme.title: Virgin Secrets
programme.desc: Melissa Moody, enceinte de plusieurs mois, vient se présenter au domicile des Chase. Elle est reçue par Charlene et Philip, la mère et le frère cadet de Ronnie, mort cinq ans plus tôt. Melissa, qui n'a connu que Ronnie, affirme que le bébé qu'elle attend est de lui. Totalement incrédule et toujours affectée par la mort de son fils, Charlene renvoie aussitôt Melissa, qui part trouver refuge chez Bill et Gail Erwin. Le couple s'occupe de la jeune femme depuis qu'elle est en froid avec ses parents, effrayés par sa crise mystique.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: Pause
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: Homme d'affaires à la retraite, Michael Kingley rentre en Australie pour participer à un vote important de l'entreprise que gère désormais son fils et qui concerne un projet minier menaçant de polluer des terres. Sa petite-fille l'implore de ne pas voter en faveur. Une tempête interrompt la réunion qui est remise au lendemain. En parallèle, il est assailli de visions qui ont un lien avec son enfance. Petit garçon, il vivait sur une plage avec son père, entourée d'oiseaux sauvages. Un jour, il commence à prendre soin de bébés pélican dont les parents ont été abattus par des chasseurs.

programme.title: La jeune fille et son aigle
programme.desc: En Mongolie, Aisholpan, une jeune fille kazakh âgée de treize ans, tente de s'imposer en tant que dresseuse d'aigles royaux, un métier réservé aux hommes. Avec l'aide de son père, elle décide d'adopter un aigle pour en faire un chasseur de renards.

programme.title: Nicostratos le pélican
programme.desc: Sur une petite île grecque, Yannis, 14 ans, vit seul avec son père Démosthène, depuis le décès de sa mère. Un jour, en se rendant à Athènes, il achète un bébé pélican au commandant d'un bateau. Il décide de le garder et de l'élever, sans en parler à Démosthène. Quand ce dernier s'en aperçoit, leurs rapports, déjà conflictuels, se dégradent, et ce d'autant que l'oiseau devient vite une véritable célébrité sur l'île.

programme.title: Madagascar 2
programme.desc: Après avoir fui New York et échoué à Madagascar, Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Melman la girafe et Gloria l'hippopotame, parviennent à atteindre les plaines d'Afrique grâce à l'aide des pingouins, qui ont réparé l'épave d'un avion. Là, tous ont l'occasion de renouer avec leurs familles éloignées et leurs racines. Marty est comme un poisson dans l'eau, tandis qu'Alex, trop habitué au béton de la Grosse Pomme, ne retrouve pas ses instincts. Quant à la girafe, elle tente par tous les moyens d'avouer son amour à Gloria tandis que celle-ci est courtisée de toutes parts.

programme.title: Un peu, beaucoup, aveuglément
programme.desc: Une jeune pianiste, passionnée par son art mais peu sûre d'elle, s'installe enfin seule dans un appartement. Mais, dès la première nuit, d'étranges bruits l'effraient et la poussent à revenir chez Evguénie, son protecteur et professeur de piano. Le lendemain, elle persiste et découvre que son voisin le plus proche, un inventeur solitaire, voulait lui faire quitter son appartement. Entre les deux démarre une guerre sonore. Pourtant, bientôt, ils apprennent à se connaître.

programme.title: Les cobayes
programme.desc: Le laboratoire pharmaceutique Biothema vient de mettre au point un traitement, intitulé Ocy 36, qui influe sur les sentiments de ses sujets. Après plusieurs phases d'essais concluants, la laboratoire fait appel à des cobayes humains pour la dernière phase de tests. Adam, chercheur en sciences sociales, et Charlotte, cadre dans une grande entreprise, en couple depuis le lycée et parents d'un petit Basile, se portent volontaires, en espérant que ce traitement sauvera leur couple. Tous deux commencent le traitement, mais celui-ci ne montre pas de résultats immédiats.

programme.title: Le premier jour du reste de ta vie
programme.desc: Alors que Marie-Jeanne Duval est une maman douce, Robert, lui, est un père plutôt effacé, qui gagne sa vie comme chauffeur de taxi. Ensemble, ils ont deux fils et une fille : Albert, brillant mais colérique, Raphaël, un doux rêveur mélomane, et enfin Fleur, la benjamine révoltée. Sur une période d'une douzaine d'années, chacun des membres de cette famille, semblable à beaucoup d'autres, va vivre une journée qui marquera à jamais son existence. Ainsi, pour suivre des études de médecine, Albert s'installe dans un studio et fait la connaissance de sa voisine.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: Jeune et golri
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Les enfants ont toujours raison et les parents sont toujours ivres

programme.title: Jeune et golri
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 Le maitre et le caca

programme.title: Le dernier Vermeer
programme.desc: Le 29 mai 1945, trois semaines après la chute du Reich d'Hitler, des soldats américains découvrent dans un train un important chargement d'oeuvres d'art. Parmi elles, «Le Christ et la Femme adultère», un tableau du peintre flamand Johannes Vermeer. Enrôlé par l'armée canadienne, le capitaine Joseph Piller, juif d'origine néerlandaise, est chargé de retrouver les propriétaires des oeuvres spoliées ainsi que ceux qui les ont volées. L'officier s'intéresse plus particulièrement au tableau de Vermeer, apparemment vendu à Hermann Göring par Han Van Meegeren, un marchand d'art néerlandais.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Mexico est depuis six jours le théâtre d'enlèvements d'enfants de parents fortunés. L'industriel Samuel Ramos et sa femme Lisa engagent alors John Creasy, ancien agent de la CIA, pour assurer la protection rapprochée de Pita, leur fillette de 9 ans. Creasy tolère à peine cet enfant précoce, qui ne cesse de l'interroger sur sa vie. Mais, peu à peu, il apprend à l'apprécier. Pita est enlevée. Creasy se lance dans une vendetta.

programme.title: Mes voisines sont toutes coquines
programme.desc: Mes voisines sont toutes coquines.

programme.title: Les heures sombres
programme.desc: Le 9 mai 1940, alors qu'Adolf Hitler a envahi la Tchécoslovaquie, la Pologne, le Danemark et la Norvège, trois millions de soldats allemands sont stationnés à la frontière belges, prêts à envahir le reste de l'Europe. En Angleterre, le Parlement a perdu confiance en Neville Chamberlain, qui cherchait à préserver la paix à n'importe quel prix, et doit lui trouver, très rapidement, un remplaçant. Un nom semble se démarquer, celui du conservateur Winston Churchill, aux positions radicalement opposées à celles de Chamberlain.

programme.title: Trauma Zéro
programme.desc: Dans un futur proche, un homme a recours à un traitement médical pour soigner sa peur de l'eau. Quand il découvre l'origine de sa phobie, sa vie bascule.

programme.title: Shrek 4 : il était une fin
programme.desc: Ayant regagné sa demeure avec femme et enfants, Shrek devrait être heureux. Mais il s'ennuie. Plus personne ne le craint. Lors de la fête d'anniversaire de ses enfants, les tensions s'accumulent pour l'ogre. Les trois petits cochons dévorent le gâteau. Shrek craque et finit par se mettre terriblement en colère. S'éloignant, il rencontre Tracassin, un sorcier qui lui propose un pacte. Contre une signature sur un contrat, il lui offre la possibilité de redevenir un véritable ogre. Shrek accepte… et se réveille dans un monde où plus personne ne le connaît.

programme.title: La sorcière de Noël
programme.desc: Comme chaque année, la Befana, la sorcière préférée des petits italiens, parcourt les villes du pays juchée sur son balais pour distribuer, dans les chaussettes laissées par les bambins, des cadeaux aux enfants sages et du charbon pour ceux qui le sont moins. Mais cette nuit, perturbée par un chien, la Befana n'a pas eu le temps de donner son cadeau à un petit garçon. Vingt-cinq ans plus tard, la Befana oeuvre toujours de nuit, pour préparer celle du 6 janvier, tandis qu'elle se dissimule le jour sous celle de Paola, une institutrice.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: Katherine Newbury, une présentatrice de talk show, est entourée d'auteurs masculins qu'elle tyrannise. Brad, son adjoint, lui conseille d'engager une plume féminine. Ce sera la positive Molly, d'origine indienne et dont l'unique expérience est d'écrire des blagues pour ses collègues d'un complexe chimique. Surnommée "huit" par sa nouvelle patronne, Molly fait ce qu'elle peut pour s'imposer. Entre-temps, la patronne de la chaîne annonce à Katherine qu'elle sera bientôt débarquée du show. Avec Molly et son équipe, celle-ci réussit à créer à nouveau le buzz autour de l'émission.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: Sonic, le film
programme.desc: Sonic, un hérisson bleu qui court à une vitesse incroyable, est poursuivi dans les rues de San Francisco par le docteur Ivo Robotnik, un scientifique fou et moustachu. La créature se souvient alors de son enfance, sur une île très lointaine, protégé par le hibou Longclaw. C'est ce même Longclaw qui va envoyer Sonic sur Terre alors que sa vie est menacée par d'inquiétantes créatures. Dix années passent et le hérisson vit désormais dans la petite ville de Green Hillsl, en plein coeur du Montana, où il multiplie les records de vitesse sur les routes, intrigant le policier Tom Wachowski.

programme.title: Boule et Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: L'échange des princesses
programme.desc: A Versailles, en 1712, le duc d'Anjou, jalousement veillé par madame de Ventadour, devient le nouvel héritier du trône après la mort du duc de Bretagne. En 1722, Louis XV, âgé de 11 ans, est de retour à Versailles, abandonné sept ans plus tôt. Philippe d'Orléans, régent soucieux d'assurer la paix du royaume, souhaite marier Louis XV avec l'infante d'Espagne, Maria Anna Victoria, âgée de 4 ans. Si l'adolescent accepte, Louise-Elisabeth, la fille de Philippe d'Orléans, se refuse, elle, à épouser le prince des Asturies.

programme.title: Toute ressemblance...
programme.desc: Alors que, traversant une mauvaise passe, il est poursuivi par des paparazzi sous le pont de l'Alma, Cédric Saint Guérande, le plus célèbre présentateur de journal télévisé de France, repense à ses débuts, 18 ans plus tôt, quand le fade Jean-Charles Balin tenait son poste et que Cédric travaillait dans on ombre. Il se souvient du moment où son destin bascule, le 11 septembre 2001, quand il se retrouve à la place de Balin devant les caméras pour présenter le journal télévisé. Pour Cédric, c'est le début d'une irrésistible ascension.

programme.title: American Pie : marions-les !
programme.desc: Sous le regard aimant de son papa, Jim s'est décidé à demander Michelle en mariage. Ravi que celle-ci ait accepté, il souhaite lui organiser une fête inoubliable. Mais le chemin jusqu'à l'autel s'annonce semé d'embuches pour le jeune homme. Entre son enterrement de vie de garçon avec ses amis illuminés, la présentation des deux familles et la pression du jour J, il va en voir de toutes les couleurs.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Une occasion en or

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S2 E1 La mort est un poème

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S2 E2 Opéra pour un meurtrier

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Peu avant sa mort, David Walker voulait retrouver celui qui avait abusé de lui dans son enfance. L'inspectrice Cassie Stuart recherche un violeur potentiel qui serait âgé de 80 ans environ. Jason Walker la sollicite et demande à voir son père à la morgue pour lui dire au revoir. James Gregory, restaurateur et ami de David, témoigne à son tour. Il révèle que les femmes, l'alcool et la drogue aidaient David à oublier sa honte d'avoir été victime d'agression sexuelle et de n'avoir rien dit à personne.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Les enquêteurs poursuivent leurs investigations sur Colin, Sara et Marion. Cassie veut aussi savoir ce que Tessa a fait 48 heures avant la disparition de David Walker, son mari. Puis les policiers font une terrible découverte sur lui. Il était pédophile. Cassie décide d'étudier sa vie en profondeur pour savoir si des victimes ont voulu se venger. L'une d'elles témoigne et raconte que David organisa des réunions dans une maison entre des adultes et des mineurs entre 1981 et 1983.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Jason en veut à Tessa, sa mère, d'avoir vécu avec un pédophile et quitte la maison. Sara cherche des preuves de son séjour en Italie pour consolider son alibi. Marion raconte à son mari comment son père a abusé d'elle dans son enfance et l'indifférence de sa mère quand elle le lui a révélé. A cause de cela, elle a fait quelque chose de terrible. De son côté, Colin promet à Simon qu'il n'a pas tué Walker, mais qu'il ne peut pas lui dire toute la vérité.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Cassie est persuadée que Sara a été violée par David Walker et Colin et Marion par des personnes restant à identifier. Les trois victimes se sont connues dans un hôpital où elles ont été soignées et ont fomenté ensemble un plan pour se venger. Cassie rend visite au père de Colin à Glasgow puis à la mère de Marion, qui lui donnent de précieux indices. Enfin, elle recueille le témoignage de Colin. Il lui raconte avoir été violé par un ami de son père dès l'âge de 9 ans. Et que Sara et Marion ont vécu des choses bien pires.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Tandis que la police enquête sur l'effraction qui a eu lieu au domicile de Faith, celle-ci se rend chez Cerys pour en savoir plus sur les relations qu'Evan entretenait avec les Glynn. La relation entre Faith et Steve devient plus intime, ce qui n'échappe pas au capitaine Williams qui demande à l'agent Jones de prendre Faith en filature..

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: La voiture d'Evan a été retrouvée sur un lieu connu pour le nombre de suicides élevés qui y sont commis. Mais aucune preuve ne laisse penser à un tel acte. Faith est à nouveau interrogée par la police, et Steve prend des risques pour l'aider..

programme.title: Meurtres à White House Farm
programme.desc: Après avoir fait une découverte capitale sur les lieux du crime, Stan et Mick sont de plus en plus persuadés de la culpabilité de Jeremy. Par ailleurs, Brett, un ami néo-zélandais arrive à la ferme, provoquant une vive tension entre Jeremy et Julie, sa petite amie. Ann se méfie de plus en plus de son cousin. Stan s'inquiète de voir les corps rendus à la famille. Si la crémation a lieu, des preuves pourraient bien être perdues à jamais..

programme.title: Meurtres à White House Farm
programme.desc: Alors que les funérailles approchent, Stan est de plus en plus frustré. L'enquête piétine malgré ses efforts. Mais, au moment où tout semble perdu, un témoin inattendu fait son apparition..

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S2 E5 À bout de force

programme.title: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 La maison du péril

programme.title: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Le chat et la souris

programme.title: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 Je ne suis pas coupable

programme.title: Below the Surface
programme.desc: Les terroristes tentent d'organiser un autre entretien avec Naja, mais Leon, l'un des otages, tombe malade, ce qui les contraint à demander de l'aide. Philip s'empare de l'occasion pour organiser un raid et envoie deux équipes de tireurs d'élite dans le tunnel. Il ignore que les lieux ont été piégés..

This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

IMDb data; ttnr: 7049682, Title: Watchmen, --- Description: Watchmen: Created by Damon Lindelof. With Regina King, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Tom Mison, Sara Vickers. Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa","dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? IMDb data; ttnr: 7049682, Title: Watchmen, --- Description: Watchmen: Created by Damon Lindelof. With Regina King, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Tom Mison, Sara Vickers. Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa","dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? IMDb data; ttnr: 7049682, Title: Watchmen, --- Description: Watchmen: Created by Damon Lindelof. With Regina King, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Tom Mison, Sara Vickers. Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa","dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa","dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

IMDb data; ttnr: 7671070, Title: Industry, --- Description: Industry: Created by Mickey Down, Konrad Kay. With Marisa Abela, Myha'la Herrold, David Jonsson, Harry Lawtey. Young bankers and traders make their way in the financial world in the aftermath of the 2008 collapse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7671070/","name":"Industry","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ5ZjllMDgtZWQxZS00YjcwLWEwOTAtMGUxZTNhMGMzMGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Young bankers and traders make their way in the financial world in the aftermath of the 2008 collapse.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7671070/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dishantpatel88","dateCreated":"2020-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Niche Target Audience","reviewBody":"Being in the industry myself as an intern, I can say that there is a lot of truth behind what I've seen in the first episode.

The show definitely has a niche target however, which is probably why there are numerous bad ratings. Many admirable things in the show can only be appreciated by those in the industry/position of the main characters, which makes it that much less appealing to those who aren't.

However, like Suits, there are also some ridiculous blown out of proportion details.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-09","keywords":"london england,finance industry,trader,twenty something,competition","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9684601/","name":"Myha'la Herrold","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3312312/","name":"Marisa Abela","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9657438/","name":"David Jonsson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0618997/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5919315/","name":"Mickey Down","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6181131/","name":"Konrad Kay"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2834022681","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDU5ZGFhYzYtYTAwYy00MGQ3LThlMWUtNjI1YWZmNzhiZGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDU5ZGFhYzYtYTAwYy00MGQ3LThlMWUtNjI1YWZmNzhiZGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Fuelled by ambition, youth and romance, Industry examines issues of gender, race, class, and privilege in the workplace as five impressionable young minds begin to forge their identities within the pressure cooker environment and sensory blitz of Pierpoint & Co's trading floor, where meritocracy is promised but hierarchy is king."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Every Brilliant Thing
Every Brilliant Thing
programme.desc: Every Brilliant Thing: With Jonny Donahoe, Tobey Maguire. A son creates a list of things worth living for--all in an attempt to raise the spirits of his chronically depressed mother--in this adaptation of the acclaimed one-character show." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7455360/","name":"Every Brilliant Thing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ4ODE1OTctYTYyNC00NzFiLTlmMTEtMWI4MjRmYjczMjk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A son creates a list of things worth living for--all in an attempt to raise the spirits of his chronically depressed mother--in this adaptation of the acclaimed one-character show.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7455360/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"koofasa"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Truly amazing!","reviewBody":"There are many reasons this one-man show is great but my gut says the best reason is because no conclusions were drawn about how to solve depression and suicide. It's one mans approach to coping with bipolar disorder in his family and in himself. It is brilliant in every way. programme.title: Nur Gott kann mich richten
Nur Gott kann mich richten
programme.desc:
Nur Gott kann mich richten: Directed by Özgür Yildirim. With Neil Malik Abdullah, Kai Ivo Baulitz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Zejhun Demirov. After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, and Ricky could use the money to set up his new life. Ricky hesitates at first but then agrees. Complications arise as soon as some preparations start. Things kept going out in awry, especially as a form of hardup policewoman Diana." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6175764/","name":"Nur Gott kann mich richten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjExZjMyMTItNWVjYy00M2U4LTllZTAtYzQwNDdkZmVkNDBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA3Njg4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6175764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DimitrisPassas-TapTheLine"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Guns, robberies and 25 kilos of heroin in today's Frankfurt.","reviewBody":"This is a fabulous German production, shot in Frankfurt, with a plot that entails the underground people of drug trafficking, two brothers who were in prison for a botched robbery that resulted in the serious injury of two people, and a young female police officer, being in a desperate need for money in order to help her sick daughter.

Moritz Bleibtreu, one of the best contemporary German thespians, plays the role of Ricky, a young man who is totally immersed in the outlaw lifestyle and Edin Hasanovic is his brother, Rafa who, even though he takes part in his brother's shady dealings and endeavors, has a good heart and is gonna soon be a father to a baby. When the two siblings are stopped by the police with their car full of 25 kilos of stolen heroin, they will have to leave the drugs behind and Diana (Birgit Minichmayr) will seize the opportunity to make some easy money by selling the stuff to local dealers.

I will not reveal anything more about the plot as it takes some nasty twists and turns that will definitely keep you on the edge of your seat, as the level of suspense is held in high standards throughout the movie's running time. The director, Özgür Yildirim , does a remarkable job in handling the camera in the action scenes which are all wonderfully captured. The performances by the three protagonists are outstanding, proving that Germany is not dead as far as the production of quality silver screen movies is concerned. In a way, the movie reminded me the "Ardennes" (2015), a Belgian crime film, also featuring two delinquent brothers as protagonists. The family drama is intense in "Only God Can Judge Me" too and the finale is both strong and sad for the main characters.

If you are a fan of Euro-Crime films, you should check this one out and you are bound to be thoroughly entertained.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1938,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-01-25","keywords":"frankfurt germany,botched robbery,jail,revenge,strong female character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918510873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2494529/","name":"Neil Malik Abdullah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062049/","name":"Kai Ivo Baulitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001953/","name":"Moritz Bleibtreu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0612398/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

Shadow
programme.desc:
Ying: Directed by Yimou Zhang. With Chao Deng, Li Sun, Ryan Zheng, Qianyuan Wang. Life and intrigue in an ancient Chinese court." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6864046/","name":"Ying","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFjODJjZTMtOGYwMy00ZWYzLThjZWMtOTAxOTJmMTJhN2QzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life and intrigue in an ancient Chinese court.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6864046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"my_anywhere"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Convolution Ruins It","reviewBody":"Aesthetically, this is one of the most artful films I've ever seen. Each shot is gorgeously crafted; the costumes, the set pieces, the battle sequences.

If only the plot hadn't worn away at the positives. One or two ending twists is fine, but they shoved in so many redirections at the end, trying desperately to outmaneuver the audience, that the film devolves into indiscernible ridiculousness. I had high hopes for this one, and it could have lived up to them given the artful qualities, but it unfortunately fell short.

Still worth a watch, but don't expect a storytelling masterpiece.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14556,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-30","keywords":"king,training,underwater scene,umbrella,blood","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1197849881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ0ZDBlZDgtM2E5MS00N2U5LTk2MmEtN2UxYmM5YTA2OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ0ZDBlZDgtM2E5MS00N2U5LTk2MmEtN2UxYmM5YTA2OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a kingdom ruled by a young and unpredictable king, the military commander has a secret weapon: a "shadow," a look-alike who can fool both his enemies and the King himself. Now he must use this weapon in an intricate plan that will lead his people to victory in a war that the King does not want."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2874732/","name":"Chao Deng"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2111748/","name":"Li Sun"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4404779/","name":"Ryan Zheng"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955443/","name":"Yimou Zhang"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0700891/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0360787/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0700892/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8976470/","name":"Wei Li"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955443/","name":"Yimou Zhang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837678/","name":"Sujin Zhu"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
Stirb langsam 3 – Jetzt erst recht
programme.desc:
Die Hard: With a Vengeance: Directed by John McTiernan. With Bruce Willis, Jeremy Irons, Samuel L. Jackson, Graham Greene. John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112864/","name":"Die Hard: With a Vengeance","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI0ZWFiMmQtMjRlZi00ZmFhLWI4NmYtMjQ5YmY0MzIyMzRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112864/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"redkiwi"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Spectacular","reviewBody":"Regardless of what you might think of Bruce Willis, he really does excel in this series of films and John McClane, the all action policeman is the perfect role for him.

This time his sidekick is the guru of the action film, Samuel L. Jackson, the owner of an electrical store, as he goes up against the ever excellent Jeremy irons, who can play a bad guy like few others.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc:
The Hurricane Heist: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace, Ryan Kwanten, Ralph Ineson. Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5360952/","name":"The Hurricane Heist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3Y2MyNjgtMzk4ZS00OTU3LWEwZmMtN2Y0NTdlZjU0NGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5360952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bankofmarquis"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Doesn't Go Far Enough","reviewBody":"There are times when all I want to do is to sit in a darkened movie theater, turn off my brain, and let a movie with a silly, over-the-top premise wash all over me. THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS films are an example of an "A" in this category. Last year's GEOSTORM was a "B" (it was so over-the-top that it was fun, especially when the meteorologist declared - as if he was reciting Shakespeare - "Oh my God, it's a GEOSTORM!"). Unfortunately, a "C" example of this is THE HURRICANE HEIST.

Directed by Rob Cohen - who brought us the original FAST AND FURIOUS film lo' those many years ago - THE HURRICANE HEIST tells the tale of a HEIST set during a...anyone?...HURRICANE. That's pretty much all you need to know of the plot. The rest is action, escapes, weather gone bad, bad guys being bad guys and good guys being good guys.

The good guys are Toby Kebbel (so good as the motion capture bad-guy ape in DAWN OF THE PLANET OF THE APES), perennial "B"-movie actress Maggie Grace (TAKEN, LOST and the immortal HOT GIRL, FAST CAR, EATING A BANANA) and Ryan Kwanten (I guess he was in TRUE BLOOD). What do these good guys have in common? They are not hard to look at on the screen. The two men also have really bad Southern accents.

The bad guys are led by Ralph Ineson ( a perennial "that guy" in such films as STAR WARS: THE LAST JEDI, GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY and KINGSMAN: THE SECRET SERVICE) and a host of "red shirts". The problem is that Ineson plays his bad guy role as a "that guy" and the "red shirts" have no personality at all. One guy tries to be the "loose cannon" but he doesn't go far enough, nor does Ineson or ANY of the bad guys.

Oh...did I mention Ben Cross (Sarek in the new STAR TREK films)? Cross leaped off the screen in the Oscar winning film CHARIOTS OF FIRE way back in 1981 and was going to be "the next big thing". How has that worked out for him? I'm sure he's making a nice living, but...

But...you don't come to this kind of films for the acting. You come to it for the insane premise, the over-the-top acting, the out-of-this-world stunts and special effects. Unfortunately, THE HURRICANE HEIST plays each one of these "safely". The premise is insane, just not insane enough. The acting is melodramatic - just not over-the-top. The script doesn't really have any "oh-my-gosh, did he just say that" lines and the action, stunts and special effects are pretty good, (maybe even good), but not great.

A pretty mediocre time at the movies. It did serve it's purpose, I turned my brain off for two hours. I just wish it didn't power down as well.

Letter Grade: C (thanks for trying)

5 (out of 10) stars and you can take that to the Bank(ofMarquis)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20153,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-03-09","keywords":"disaster movie,hurricane,heist,category 5 hurricane,meteorologist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3874076697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0NWYwZjQtNDhlNy00NGE1LWJiOTctMzRiOGJmZmUzYzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0NWYwZjQtNDhlNy00NGE1LWJiOTctMzRiOGJmZmUzYzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Under the threat of a hurricane, opportunistic criminals infiltrate a US Mint facility to steal $600 million for the ultimate heist. When the hurricane blows up into a lethal CATEGORY 5 storm and their well-made plans go awry, they find themselves needing a vault code known only by one Treasury Agent (Maggie Grace), a need that turns murderous. But the Treasury agent has picked up an unlikely ally, a meteorologist (Toby Kebbell) terrified of hurricanes but determined to save his estranged brother kidnapped by the thieves. He uses his knowledge of the storm as a weapon to win in this non-stop action thriller ride charged with adrenaline throughout."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1527905/","name":"Toby Kebbell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477127/","name":"Ryan Kwanten"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139768/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493589/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934698/","name":"Scott Windhauser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144003/","name":"Jeff Dixon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277759/","name":"Anthony Fingleton"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

He uses his knowledge of the storm as a weapon to win in this non-stop action thriller ride charged with adrenaline throughout.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1527905/","name":"Toby Kebbell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477127/","name":"Ryan Kwanten"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139768/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119730/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493589/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934698/","name":"Scott Windhauser","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144003/","name":"Jeff Dixon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277759/","name":"Anthony Fingleton"],"duration":"PT1H43M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Solomon Kane
Solomon Kane
programme.desc:
Solomon Kane: Directed by M.J. Bassett. With James Purefoy, Mark O'Neal, Robert Orr, Richard Ryan. A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0970452/","name":"Solomon Kane","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDMwOTkxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg5OTM1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0970452/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"foxycritic"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Soloman Kan was pretty good, its a shame it didn't get as much Advertising as some other Action films get.","reviewBody":"Solomon Kane was pretty good, perhaps it didn't do well in the States, because there were no American A listers in the cast, but it had Pete Postlethwaite and Max Von Snow apart from James Purefoy in the lead, so you could hardly say it didn't have it's quota of serious actors in it.

Yes it was a tad predictable, well it was from the creator of Conan, so you could hardly expect high art. But, unlike you would have expected, it was quite a dark film, one mans quest to redeem his soul, and you believed in it, Purefoy played the complete ruthless murderer and the tortured soul, and in the confines of the film you believed it.

It betrayed it's lowish budget, with a lack of major CGI except where it was needed, and at the beginning the model work was a bit obvious (like Conan all those years ago) but instead went for serious good makeup and prosthetics,and the fight scenes when they happened where vicious, bloody and really well choreographed, Purefoy does good action. I really enjoyed this film for what it was, ENJOYMENT.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":72059,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2009-12-23","keywords":"violence,redemption,revenge,burning sword,handheld weapon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi731555097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzMzNzQ2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNDMxOA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzMzNzQ2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNDMxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mercenary who owes his soul to the devil redeems himself by fighting evil. 
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700856/","name":"James Purefoy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001884/","name":"Max von Sydow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1248393/","name":"Rachel Hurd-Wood"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1068186/","name":"M.J. Bassett"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032081/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126947/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0223601/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1068186/","name":"M.J. programme.title: Bølgen
The Wave – Die Todeswelle
programme.desc:
Bølgen: Directed by Roar Uthaug. With Kristoffer Joner, Ane Dahl Torp, Jonas Hoff Oftebro, Edith Haagenrud-Sande. Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3616916/","name":"Bølgen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE2NmNjOWMtZWJmNC00ZmFiLWI3ZDgtYWU3MWZhOGVhMTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg0NDI1MjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3616916/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wowmats"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"6.5! Decent :)","reviewBody":"The movie is about a geologist that discovers some weird activity in the mountains in Åkneset (Norway) They discover that unless they evacuate the whole city in time, a piece of the mountain will fall into the water and create a monster wave of 80m that will crush everything in its path. So now the geologist played by Kristoffer Joner is doing everything in his power to save his family and his beloved small town.

Short review. Great special effect, good score, good acting. Predictable script and lacks depth, but is still good enough entertainment for the whole family :) There is nothing revolutionary or new about this, but hey! Isn't it always pleasurable when things are done right?

Ps, it's also interesting that this is actually something that has happened before and might happen again!

Final thoughts...GO CHECK IT OUT!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-28","keywords":"natural disaster,disaster,disaster film,norway,flood","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2929702169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Even though awaited, no-one is really ready when the mountain pass of ÃƒÂ…kneset above the scenic narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger falls out and creates a 85 meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427379/","name":"Kristoffer Joner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335996/","name":"Ane Dahl Torp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3026834/","name":"Jonas Hoff Oftebro"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1012385/","name":"Roar Uthaug"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086720/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234299/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5006328/","name":"John Kåre Raake"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0995943/","name":"Harald Rosenløw-Eeg"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dark Tide
Dark Tide
programme.desc:
Dark Tide: Directed by John Stockwell. With Halle Berry, Olivier Martinez, Sizwe Msutu, Mark Elderkin. A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1507563/","name":"Dark Tide","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTUxOTc3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDkwOTgzNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1507563/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rik-317-369787"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not bad","reviewBody":"I liked Darktide mainly because of it's camera work and portrayal of the Great White shark.

The film is let down by a thin plot and bland characters.

programme.title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
Stirb langsam 3 – Jetzt erst recht
programme.desc:
Die Hard: With a Vengeance: Directed by John McTiernan. With Bruce Willis, Jeremy Irons, Samuel L. Jackson, Graham Greene. John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112864/","name":"Die Hard: With a Vengeance","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI0ZWFiMmQtMjRlZi00ZmFhLWI4NmYtMjQ5YmY0MzIyMzRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112864/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"redkiwi"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Spectacular","reviewBody":"Regardless of what you might think of Bruce Willis, he really does excel in this series of films and John McClane, the all action policeman is the perfect role for him.

This time his sidekick is the guru of the action film, Samuel L. Jackson, the owner of an electrical store, as he goes up against the ever excellent Jeremy irons, who can play a bad guy like few others.

Irons is executing the greatest heist ever, and the shots throughout the film are spectacular. The lack of any half decent script is completely masked by explosions, but what else would you expect?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":375402,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1995-05-19","keywords":"john mcclane character,time bomb,good versus evil,motor car,weapon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Hard: With a Vengeance","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2434245657","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEzZTc2ZmEtMDQwYy00M2RiLThmYzItNmE2Y2RiZDJmMTFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEzZTc2ZmEtMDQwYy00M2RiLThmYzItNmE2Y2RiZDJmMTFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Die Hard: With a Vengeance"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. programme.title: Bad Boys
Bad Boys – Harte Jungs
programme.desc:
Bad Boys: Directed by Michael Bay. With Lisa Boyle, Michael Taliferro, Emmanuel Xuereb, Tchéky Karyo. Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112442/","name":"Bad Boys","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE1ZTQ0ZTEtZTEwZS00NWE0LTlmMDUtMTE1ZWJiZTYzZTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112442/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Casa2000"},"dateCreated":"1999-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Michael Bay: The Next Big Thing","reviewBody":"I had no high hopes when I walked into this film. I like Will Smith, I like Martin Lawrence, so I figured this film will at least be funny. And it was funny, and then some. It was action packed, thrilling and a helluva good time. I came out of the theatre thinking that the guy who directed that movie is going to be huge.

Michael Bay, former music video and commercial director, has made an incredible directorial debut. The film never stops. When it isn't action-packed, it is funny. It is sexy, fun and always moving. Christian Wagner's editing is phenomenal. I love action movies that really try to be action movies. A lot of action films know that they are action films so they try to incorporate other genres to make the film more complete, but they often fail miserably. They try so hard to be something they are not that they forget what they are in the first place. The essence of the action film is the action. It is a necessary component, it needs to be there otherwise it loses its edge. "Bad Boys" doesn't just throw in the occassional action sequence to meet the expectations of the genre, but instead uses the action to help tell the story. It is this use of filmmaking that allows an action film to remain an action film and still go beyond.

Watch "Bad Boys" again and every time there is an action sequence, ask yourself why that was there and what did it accomplish. You will find that each sequence took the film to another level; it introduced an new conflict, it increased the present conflict, it eliminated a key character, it introduced a new character, and so on. There are a lot of action films out there that sacrifice story for spectacle, and the audience notices this. At the centre of all films lies the story and if it comes to a halt so does the interest of the viewers.

"Bad Boys" of course isn't the greatest story on film, or even in the action genre, but what is so appealing and memorable about "Bad Boys" is that it is just as entertaining with its story as it is with its action by combining the two without sacrificing either. Michael Bay understands the importance of the story within the structure of the film. He tells a visual story, entertaining and complete, and leaves you very satisfied. Watch for Michael Bay because he is here to stay."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":252490,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1995-04-07","keywords":"miami florida,buddy movie,criminal investigation,murder investigation,usa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bad Boys","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2344091929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001454/","name":"Martin Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102288/","name":"Lisa Boyle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303032/","name":"George Gallo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057398/","name":"Michael Barrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0611848/","name":"Jim Mulholland"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Cartels: Directed by Keoni Waxman. With Steven Seagal, Luke Goss, Georges St-Pierre, Darren E. Scott. Lots of shooting follows." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4949290/","name":"Cartels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTU2NWVjNGItNTEwNS00OGUyLWJkMGMtYTVkYTVmNzg0Nzk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTE2MTYxOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drug lord is captured and held "secretly" by 6 US agents at a hotel in Constanta, Romania. programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc:
The Hurricane Heist: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace, Ryan Kwanten, Ralph Ineson. Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5360952/","name":"The Hurricane Heist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3Y2MyNjgtMzk4ZS00OTU3LWEwZmMtN2Y0NTdlZjU0NGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5360952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bankofmarquis"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Doesn't Go Far Enough","reviewBody":"There are times when all I want to do is to sit in a darkened movie theater, turn off my brain, and let a movie with a silly, over-the-top premise wash all over me. THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS films are an example of an "A" in this category. Last year's GEOSTORM was a "B" (it was so over-the-top that it was fun, especially when the meteorologist declared - as if he was reciting Shakespeare - "Oh my God, it's a GEOSTORM!"). Unfortunately, a "C" example of this is THE HURRICANE HEIST.

Directed by Rob Cohen - who brought us the original FAST AND FURIOUS film lo' those many years ago - THE HURRICANE HEIST tells the tale of a HEIST set during a...anyone?...HURRICANE. That's pretty much all you need to know of the plot. The rest is action, escapes, weather gone bad, bad guys being bad guys and good guys being good guys.

The good guys are Toby Kebbel (so good as the motion capture bad-guy ape in DAWN OF THE PLANET OF THE APES), perennial "B"-movie actress Maggie Grace (TAKEN, LOST and the immortal HOT GIRL, FAST CAR, EATING A BANANA) and Ryan Kwanten (I guess he was in TRUE BLOOD). What do these good guys have in common? They are not hard to look at on the screen. The two men also have really bad Southern accents.

The bad guys are led by Ralph Ineson ( a perennial "that guy" in such films as STAR WARS: THE LAST JEDI, GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY and KINGSMAN: THE SECRET SERVICE) and a host of "red shirts". The problem is that Ineson plays his bad guy role as a "that guy" and the "red shirts" have no personality at all. One guy tries to be the "loose cannon" but he doesn't go far enough, nor does Ineson or ANY of the bad guys.

Oh...did I mention Ben Cross (Sarek in the new STAR TREK films)? Cross leaped off the screen in the Oscar winning film CHARIOTS OF FIRE way back in 1981 and was going to be "the next big thing". How has that worked out for him? I'm sure he's making a nice living, but...

But...you don't come to this kind of films for the acting. You come to it for the insane premise, the over-the-top acting, the out-of-this-world stunts and special effects. Unfortunately, THE HURRICANE HEIST plays each one of these "safely". The premise is insane, just not insane enough. The acting is melodramatic - just not over-the-top. The script doesn't really have any "oh-my-gosh, did he just say that" lines and the action, stunts and special effects are pretty good, (maybe even good), but not great.

A pretty mediocre time at the movies. It did serve it's purpose, I turned my brain off for two hours. I just wish it didn't power down as well.

Letter Grade: C (thanks for trying)

5 (out of 10) stars and you can take that to the Bank(ofMarquis)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20153,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-03-09","keywords":"disaster movie,hurricane,heist,category 5 hurricane,meteorologist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3874076697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0NWYwZjQtNDhlNy00NGE1LWJiOTctMzRiOGJmZmUzYzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0NWYwZjQtNDhlNy00NGE1LWJiOTctMzRiOGJmZmUzYzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Under the threat of a hurricane, opportunistic criminals infiltrate a US Mint facility to steal $600 million for the ultimate heist. When the hurricane blows up into a lethal CATEGORY 5 storm and their well-made plans go awry, they find themselves needing a vault code known only by one Treasury Agent (Maggie Grace), a need that turns murderous. But the Treasury agent has picked up an unlikely ally, a meteorologist (Toby Kebbell) terrified of hurricanes but determined to save his estranged brother kidnapped by the thieves. He uses his knowledge of the storm as a weapon to win in this non-stop action thriller ride charged with adrenaline throughout."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1527905/","name":"Toby Kebbell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477127/","name":"Ryan Kwanten"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139768/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493589/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934698/","name":"Scott Windhauser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144003/","name":"Jeff Dixon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277759/","name":"Anthony Fingleton"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bølgen
The Wave – Die Todeswelle
programme.desc:
Bølgen: Directed by Roar Uthaug. With Kristoffer Joner, Ane Dahl Torp, Jonas Hoff Oftebro, Edith Haagenrud-Sande. Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3616916/","name":"Bølgen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE2NmNjOWMtZWJmNC00ZmFiLWI3ZDgtYWU3MWZhOGVhMTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg0NDI1MjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3616916/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wowmats"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"6.5! Decent :)","reviewBody":"The movie is about a geologist that discovers some weird activity in the mountains in Åkneset (Norway) They discover that unless they evacuate the whole city in time, a piece of the mountain will fall into the water and create a monster wave of 80m that will crush everything in its path. So now the geologist played by Kristoffer Joner is doing everything in his power to save his family and his beloved small town.

Short review. Great special effect, good score, good acting. Predictable script and lacks depth, but is still good enough entertainment for the whole family :) There is nothing revolutionary or new about this, but hey! Isn't it always pleasurable when things are done right?

Ps, it's also interesting that this is actually something that has happened before and might happen again!

Final thoughts...GO CHECK IT OUT!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-28","keywords":"natural disaster,disaster,disaster film,norway,flood","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2929702169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Even though awaited, no-one is really ready when the mountain pass of ÃƒÂ…kneset above the scenic narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger falls out and creates a 85 meter high violent tsunami.
