programme.title: L'odyssée
Jacques – Entdecker der Ozeane
programme.desc:
L'odyssée: Directed by Jérôme Salle. With Lambert Wilson, Pierre Niney, Audrey Tautou, Laurent Lucas. The aquatic adventure of the highly influential and fearlessly ambitious pioneer, innovator, filmmaker, researcher, and conservationist, Jacques-Yves Cousteau, covers roughly thirty years of an inarguably rich in achievements life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1659619/","name":"L'odyssée","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzdjZGI3YjItMjM0OS00MGM3LWJhMGUtZGIxM2ZjODBmMTZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The aquatic adventure of the highly influential and fearlessly ambitious pioneer, innovator, filmmaker, researcher, and conservationist, Jacques-Yves Cousteau, covers roughly thirty years of an inarguably rich in achievements life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1659619/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"its pretty biographical","reviewBody":"So if you dont like that genre, just skip it.

but if you like to dive in the ocean and enjoy the silence beneath the sea surface, accompanied with a great and soothing score, a very good story will give you a relentless pleasure and a moment of cinematic glory you wont forget so easy. the kåstå films where part of my childhood, and i know several friends that have become divers because of the inspiration by those films. i tried too ,when in the service, but i was a weak runner and couldnt pass the test, even though i was the fastest swimmer on the trials. so this is history, my friends, the story about one of them that didnt get the divers bends, and embraced the ocean without any frontiers.

its a good production, nice actors, and underwater images, it could have a better timelineinfo, but all in all its a gripping story after all, and that makes a grumpy old man pretty stunned, therefore a recommend","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5414,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-10-12","keywords":"ecology,husband wife conflict,husband wife relationship,begins with a flashback,airplane accident","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1223407897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVmOGNkNDItNTZiNi00ZWMyLWI5YTItYjRiM2QyNmFjZWM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVmOGNkNDItNTZiNi00ZWMyLWI5YTItYjRiM2QyNmFjZWM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Highly influential and a fearlessly ambitious pioneer, innovator, filmmaker, researcher and conservationist, Jacques-Yves Cousteau's aquatic adventure covers roughly thirty years of an inarguably rich in achievements life."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933727/","name":"Lambert Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2582755/","name":"Pierre Niney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851582/","name":"Audrey Tautou"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1362432/","name":"Jérôme Salle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0571461/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593456/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1362432/","name":"Jérôme Salle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1668171/","name":"Laurent Turner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0184151/","name":"Jean-Michel Cousteau"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: L'odyssée
Jacques – Entdecker der Ozeane
programme.desc:
L'odyssée: Directed by Jérôme Salle. With Lambert Wilson, Pierre Niney, Audrey Tautou, Laurent Lucas. The aquatic adventure of the highly influential and fearlessly ambitious pioneer, innovator, filmmaker, researcher, and conservationist, Jacques-Yves Cousteau, covers roughly thirty years of an inarguably rich in achievements life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1659619/","name":"L'odyssée","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzdjZGI3YjItMjM0OS00MGM3LWJhMGUtZGIxM2ZjODBmMTZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The aquatic adventure of the highly influential and fearlessly ambitious pioneer, innovator, filmmaker, researcher, and conservationist, Jacques-Yves Cousteau, covers roughly thirty years of an inarguably rich in achievements life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1659619/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"its pretty biographical","reviewBody":"So if you dont like that genre, just skip it.

but if you like to dive in the ocean and enjoy the silence beneath the sea surface, accompanied with a great and soothing score, a very good story will give you a relentless pleasure and a moment of cinematic glory you wont forget so easy. the kåstå films where part of my childhood, and i know several friends that have become divers because of the inspiration by those films. i tried too ,when in the service, but i was a weak runner and couldnt pass the test, even though i was the fastest swimmer on the trials. so this is history, my friends, the story about one of them that didnt get the divers bends, and embraced the ocean without any frontiers.

its a good production, nice actors, and underwater images, it could have a better timelineinfo, but all in all its a gripping story after all, and that makes a grumpy old man pretty stunned, therefore a recommend","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5414,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-10-12","keywords":"ecology,husband wife conflict,husband wife relationship,begins with a flashback,airplane accident","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1223407897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVmOGNkNDItNTZiNi00ZWMyLWI5YTItYjRiM2QyNmFjZWM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVmOGNkNDItNTZiNi00ZWMyLWI5YTItYjRiM2QyNmFjZWM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Highly influential and a fearlessly ambitious pioneer, innovator, filmmaker, researcher and conservationist, Jacques-Yves Cousteau's aquatic adventure covers roughly thirty years of an inarguably rich in achievements life."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933727/","name":"Lambert Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2582755/","name":"Pierre Niney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851582/","name":"Audrey Tautou"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1362432/","name":"Jérôme Salle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0571461/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593456/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1362432/","name":"Jérôme Salle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1668171/","name":"Laurent Turner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0184151/","name":"Jean-Michel Cousteau"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Transplant
Transplant
Transplant
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 S1 E2 Tell Me Who You Are
programme.desc:
Transplant: Created by Joseph Kay. With Laurence Leboeuf, Hamza Haq, Ayisha Issa, Jim Watson. An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10936342/","name":"Transplant","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRlYWY0ODctODRhZC00Nzg3LWEzYzUtOTFlNDg5N2RkMDc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NTYzMDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10936342/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thankfully it's not another Grey's Anatomy, Chicago Med, etc. +EDIT","reviewBody":"So far so good. Not your typical Hospital TV show, in fact, it's uniqueness and stellar performances by Hamza Haq and John Hannah kept me captivated.

I did however feel there was "too much" focus on racism - an not the real struggle, and I hope that fades away as the main focus of the show. There were some obvious plot and technical issues - why wouldn't he say he's looking for his sister to the cop from the start? What's up with Ayisha Issa's characters crappy attitude? Thus I hope the melodrama also gets toned down a bit by the writers so this show doesn't end up like another Grey's Anatomy or General Hospital.

The directing, cinematography and score were spot-on in creating and maintaining the tension. Casting was also great with convincible characters - unlike Saving Hope where some doctors looked 16 years old.

I'm certainly hooked to see where this show goes next, but as of now, it's a well deserved 8/10 from me.

EDIT 4/29/20: I've lost interest. Bashir's sister looks more like his daughter. The accents are clearly fake, unconvincing and annoying. The icing on the cake is still the annoying Ayisha Issa's acting or character, or both - I still can't tell. She has the angriest look and worst bedside manner I've seen from and doctors show. She is unconvincing as a doctor. Alcoholics can have a drink every time she smiles - they'll still be sober. The writing is getting less exciting and barely interesting. From 8/10 down to 6/10. Wont be watching any more episodes."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3066,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-26","keywords":"doctor,hospital,emergency room,syrian refugee,brother sister relationship","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4407744/","name":"Hamza Haq"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495799/","name":"Laurence Leboeuf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001314/","name":"John Hannah"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0689402/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120262/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0216142/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1075746/","name":"Joseph Kay"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Transplant: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2522791449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2ZiZTliYjktZjlhYi00ZjM1LTk2N2UtODYwYzI4YzA2ZWIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2ZiZTliYjktZjlhYi00ZjM1LTk2N2UtODYwYzI4YzA2ZWIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Transplant: Season 1"}}</script><metacontent="

Not your typical Hospital TV show, in fact, it's uniqueness and stellar performances by Hamza Haq and John Hannah kept me captivated.

I did however feel there was "too much" focus on racism - an not the real struggle, and I hope that fades away as the main focus of the show. There were some obvious plot and technical issues - why wouldn't he say he's looking for his sister to the cop from the start? What's up with Ayisha Issa's characters crappy attitude? Thus I hope the melodrama also gets toned down a bit by the writers so this show doesn't end up like another Grey's Anatomy or General Hospital.

The directing, cinematography and score were spot-on in creating and maintaining the tension. Casting was also great with convincible characters - unlike Saving Hope where some doctors looked 16 years old.

I'm certainly hooked to see where this show goes next, but as of now, it's a well deserved 8/10 from me.

EDIT 4/29/20: I've lost interest. Bashir's sister looks more like his daughter. The accents are clearly fake, unconvincing and annoying. An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10936342/","name":"Transplant","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRlYWY0ODctODRhZC00Nzg3LWEzYzUtOTFlNDg5N2RkMDc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NTYzMDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10936342/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic","dateCreated":"2020-02-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thankfully it's not another Grey's Anatomy, Chicago Med, etc. +EDIT","reviewBody":"So far so good. Not your typical Hospital TV show, in fact, it's uniqueness and stellar performances by Hamza Haq and John Hannah kept me captivated.

I did however feel there was "too much" focus on racism - an not the real struggle, and I hope that fades away as the main focus of the show. There were some obvious plot and technical issues - why wouldn't he say he's looking for his sister to the cop from the start? What's up with Ayisha Issa's characters crappy attitude? Thus I hope the melodrama also gets toned down a bit by the writers so this show doesn't end up like another Grey's Anatomy or General Hospital.

The directing, cinematography and score were spot-on in creating and maintaining the tension. Casting was also great with convincible characters - unlike Saving Hope where some doctors looked 16 years old.

I'm certainly hooked to see where this show goes next, but as of now, it's a well deserved 8/10 from me.

EDIT 4/29/20: I've lost interest. Bashir's sister looks more like his daughter. The accents are clearly fake, unconvincing and annoying. The icing on the cake is still the annoying Ayisha Issa's acting or character, or both - I still can't tell. She has the angriest look and worst bedside manner I've seen from and doctors show. She is unconvincing as a doctor. Alcoholics can have a drink every time she smiles - they'll still be sober. The writing is getting less exciting and barely interesting. From 8/10 down to 6/10. programme.title: Arthur's Law
programme.desc: Claudia met au point un plan pour se venger d'Arthur. Elle lui trouve un emploi à la porcherie. Sur place, Arthur découvre des vivariums remplis d'araignées, dont une qui s'avère particulièrement mortelle..

programme.title: Arthur's Law
programme.desc: A l'insu de tous, Martha et Muriel échangent leurs places. Martha prend l'enquête de Muriel en main et fait son possible pour la saboter. Elle décide de faire accuser Jerome des meurtres en mettant ses empreintes sur l'arme du crime..

programme.title: Arthur's Law
programme.desc: Arthur découvre la supercherie des deux soeurs qui s'étaient fait passer l'une pour l'autre. Après s'être avoué mutuellement leurs sentiments, Arthur et Muriel décident de s'enfuir tous les deux pour démarrer une nouvelle vie, loin de Klein Biddenbach..

programme.title: Cinq ans de réflexion
programme.desc: Cuisinier à San Francisco, Tom a eu le coup de foudre pour Violet, brillante étudiante en psychologie. Un an plus tard, ils forment un couple idéal et se fiancent. Le mariage doit être reporté quand Violet se voit offrir un poste important à l'Université du Michigan, où Tom décide de la suivre. Mais le jeune homme ne se fait pas à sa vie là-bas. Entre temps, Alex, son meilleur ami, épouse Suzie, la sœur de Violet.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: En 10191, l’empereur Padishah Shaddam IV, de la planète Kaitain, règne sur l’Univers Connu. Se sentant menacé par les Atréides, de la planète Caladan, il noue une alliance avec les Harkonnens, de la planète Giedi Prime, pour les exterminer. Afin de mener à bien son funeste projet, il envoie les Atréides sur la planète Arrakis, également appelée Dune, source de la substance précieuse : l’épice. Sur place, les Atréides sont massacrés par les terribles Harkonnens. Deux des Atréides échappent au massacre : Paul, l’héritier du trône, et sa mère, lady Jessica.

programme.title: Le Chaperon rouge
programme.desc: Il y a bien longtemps, dans un petit village caché dans une profonde forêt, la jeune et intrépide Valerie grandit au côté de Peter. La jeune femme, promise à un mariage avec le riche Henry, est pourtant amoureuse de Peter, devenu un valeureux bûcheron. Valerie projette de partir avec lui quand elle apprend que sa sœur a été tuée par un loup-garou. Les villageois, horrifiés, pensent d'abord faire appel au père Solomon, qui a déjà affronté ce type de créatures.

programme.title: Mariage à l'anglaise
programme.desc: Depuis qu’ils se sont rencontrés dans une soirée, Nat, jeune femme ambitieuse, et Josh, apprenti romancier, nagent dans le bonheur, malgré leurs différences. Car si Josh est plutôt du genre intellectuel, Nat est une fonceuse. Ce qui ne les a pas empêchés d’être réunis par un coup de foudre réciproque. Leur mariage est idyllique, même si personne de leurs proches à leurs amis, jusqu’au pasteur qui officie, ne croit qu’il pourra durer… Surtout quand l’ex-petite amie de Josh, Chloe, et le charmant client américain de Nat, Guy, s’en mêlent.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Zombieland
programme.desc: Dans un monde désormais infesté de zombies, rares sont les survivants. Columbus, un jeune homme craintif et maladivement prudent, est l'un d'eux. Un jour, il rencontre Tallahassee, qui est son exact contraire : il n'a peur de rien et prend un malin plaisir à tuer le plus de zombies possible. Tout oppose les deux hommes, mais ils décident de continuer leur route ensemble. En chemin, ils croisent deux jeunes femmes.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: Sam, infirmière, vit dans une cité du sud de Londres. Un soir, alors qu'elle rentre chez elle, elle est agressée par un gang de jeunes dont Pest, Dennis et leur chef, Moses. Au même moment, un objet tombe du ciel et s'écrase sur une voiture à côté. Il s'agit d'une mystérieuse créature que Moses réussit à tuer. Le petit caïd compte en tirer profit mais ignore que son acte va déclencher une invasion extraterrestre.
